_meta.description: Manual corrections for SNPedia/ClinVar strand errors and misannotations
_meta.howToUse: Add entries here when you find database errors. Applied automatically on server load.

corrections.reason: Strand error - A is reference allele per dbSNP, not pathogenic

AT.summary: Carrier of a Brown-Vialetto-Van Laere syndrome mutation

TT.summary: Brown-Vialetto-Van Laere syndrome type 1 mutation; riboflavin treatment recommended

corrections.reason: Strand error - G is reference on AncestryDNA strand, 99% of users have GG
